products.name: terraform-ibm-key-protect
products.label: Key Protect module
products.short_description: Terraform module to create and work with IBM Key Protect
products.long_description:
Use this module to provision and configure an IBM Key Protect instance.

You can configure the following aspects of your instance:
- [Key Protect instance](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/key-protect?topic=key-protect-about)
- [Rotation policy](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/key-protect?topic=key-protect-set-rotation-policy&interface=ui)
- [Dual authorization policy](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/key-protect?topic=key-protect-manage-dual-auth)
- [Metrics policy](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/key-protect?topic=key-protect-manage-monitor-metrics)
- [Key create and import access policy](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/key-protect?topic=key-protect-manage-keyCreateImportAccess)
#### Usage
```hcl
module "key_protect_module" {
  # Replace "X.X.X" with a release version to lock into a specific release
  source  = "https://cm.globalcatalog.cloud.ibm.com/api/v1-beta/offering/source?archive=tgz&kind=terraform&name=terraform-ibm-key-protect&version=X.X.X"
  key_protect_name  = "my-key-protect-instance"
  resource_group_id = "xxXXxxXXxXxXXXXxxXxxxXXXXxXXXXX"
  region            = "us-south"
}
```
